prompt: You use your camera for personal family photos. Your camera came with photo organization software for your computer. You can organize your photographs into groups. Which of the following types of organization would be most useful?
feedback: The most useful organization is based on the event or trip when the photos were taken. If the photos are organized by year, then there may be many events in one year. It would be difficult to find a specific photo. If the photos are organized by day, it might similarly be difficult to find photos you want. Will you remember the specific day of an event? Or would it be easier to recognize the group “Josh’s Wedding”? Organizing the photos by color scheme is probably not very useful. You’re unlikely to look for a personal photo by color. You’re more likely to look for a photo of “Sofia’s Graduation” than “Green and Blue.”
